Alaçamlı, E., Naidoo, T., Güler, M. N., Sağlıcan, E., Aktürk, Ş., Mapelli, I., Vural, K. B., Somel, M., Malmström, H., & Günther, T. (2024). [https://doi.org/10.1186/s13059-024-03350-3](https://doi.org/10.1186/s13059-024-03350-3)
